tpsa
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Testing Polygons Spatial Association

F function adaptation for polygons

test statistic for the MC test.

pf12(obj_sp1, obj_sp2, r_min = 1, r_max = NULL, by = 1)

Arguments

obj_sp1

a SpatialPolygons or SpatialPointsDataFrame object
obj_sp2

a SpatialPolygons or SpatialPointsDataFrame object
r_min

a numeric representing the mininmun distance to calculate the function, default = 0.
r_max

a numeric representing the maximum distance to calculate the function default = max(polygonds distance matrix).
by

a numeric value that represents the how many units between each r value.

Value

a numeric matrix corresponding to the estimated \(F_{1,2}\) and \(F_{2,1}\) function in the interval \([r_{min}, r_{max}]\).

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
